D112D0D2DF5D489486CC3704CEEB2F80.description:
Students, in collaboration
with an educator, work with others,
using technology to explore local
and global issues and identify
possible solutions.

B19D9FA4E3FB42F6AF83B6C508F02781.description:
Students, in collaboration
with an educator, take on various
assigned team roles, contributing
their knowledge of technology and
content to complete a project or
solve a problem.

7AD65D77363640419D784D923DEEC15F.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
use technology to connect with
others, including peers, experts,
and community members, to
explore different points of view on
various topics.

A41A4B0FEDCA4185BD1297E36075EFE7.description:
Students, in collaboration
with an educator, use digital tools
to work with other learners,
including those from a variety of
backgrounds and cultures.

724DAB74392E4E67BAE8EB8C6F617AC6.description:
Global Collaborator - Students use digital tools to broaden their perspectives and enrich their learning by
collaborating with others and working effectively in teams locally and globally.

71C773F816C145B98F481D98E3C04201.description:
Students, in collaboration
with an educator, learn about and
consider the intended audience
when creating and publishing
digital artifacts and presentations.

18ADC0A2F0FF47B39740D08075E79C4C.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
create digital artifacts using
digital tools to communicate
ideas visually, graphically,
and/or auditorily.Â

BDA259D264404576A2DC47B8A01FD1CC.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
create original works and learn
strategies for responsibly
repurposing and remixing to
create new artifacts.

BE918CA8BDBF40A5A929F480CF0C72FC.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
recognize and utilize the
features and functions of a
variety of creation or
communication tools.

8958EE6B8A414FADA5E080CC685635EE.description:
Creative Communicator - Students communicate clearly and express themselves creatively for a variety of
purposes using the platforms, tools, styles, formats and digital media appropriate to their goals.

A17BDE98E9644C32A7C897E2F3892D95.description:
Students understand
and explore basic concepts
related to automation, patterns,
and algorithmic thinking.

B5EF4C9EF4E146C786D4B1CF18B2B0E1.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
break down problems into
smaller parts, identify key
information, and propose
solutions.

207E5573BCC94F39B09B4CB862462D32.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
select effective technology to
represent and organize data.

C94212BB4FDC464D85B45469FB0F6493.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
identify, explore or solve
problems by selecting
technology for data analysis,
modeling, and algorithmic
thinking.

5AD8FA7F4BF64E89A38B6FBDF3AA44A3.description:
Computational Thinker - Students develop and employ strategies for understanding and solving problems in
ways that leverage the power of technological methods to develop and test solutions.

E6D20A613D5740DE8207B9F190D32AEF.description:
Students demonstrate
perseverance when working
with open-ended problems.

65F4EF8D56884F3E8B938FB25D2006AB.description:
Students, in collaboration
with an educator, engage in a
cyclical design process to develop,
test and refine prototypes and
reflect on the role that trial and
error plays.

135E61EB3B214265B2F54827CE588C70.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
use digital and/or non-digital
tools to plan and manage a
design process.

9A7CB9B05B9C45748826C613DDB01CEB.description:
Students, in collaboration
with an educator, explore and
practice a design process by
generating ideas to solve a
problem by planning, creating and
testing innovative products that are
shared with others.

AA92040E99C14E3E98A59BCA4DE291E3.description:
Innovative Designer - Students use a variety of technologies within a design process to identify and solve
problems by creating new, useful or imaginative solutions.

A4AC5BFBE6F047C0BFDCC93A960B53DA.description:
Students, in collaboration
with an educator, explore real world problems and issues and
collaborate with others to find
answers or solutions.

8664AB0F27824196A9820234B42F680A.description:
Students, in collaboration
with an educator, use a variety of
strategies to collect and organize
information and make meaningful
connections between resources.

7C8EAAC71B994BB3BF1B5A57D15AF438.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
learn how to evaluate sources for
accuracy, perspective, credibility,
and relevance.

3C0FA86622694E0FBBA8B0054FD7DE3D.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
employ appropriate research
techniques to locate digital
resources that will help them in
their learning process.

E35727B8610F4FC29514E19F96F3E097.description:
Knowledge Constructor - Students critically curate a variety of resources using digital tools to construct
knowledge, produce creative artifacts, and make meaningful learning experiences for themselves and others.

98A29EAAD1E34A57BAD10A91BACDD7CD.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
demonstrate an understanding
of what personal data is, how to
keep it private, and how it might
be shared online.

C883E30ED400407F9B6A1057A1FD766C.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
examine, use, and demonstrate
respect for intellectual property
including copyright, permission,
and fair use, with both print and
digital media when using and
sharing the work of others.

74A6AACB2D0E4FD2BC2F5FA856F79721.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
identify and practice safe, legal,
and ethical behavior when
using technology and
interacting online.

1BF3353CFBCC4DDEBAFFDE3136F3761F.description:
Students demonstrate
an understanding of the role a
digital identity plays in the
digital world and learn the
permanence of their decisions
when interacting online.

37FD096AFAC64918AD312276234B9227.description:
Digital Citizen - Students recognize the rights, responsibilities, and opportunities of living, learning, and
working in an interconnected digital world, and they act and model in ways that are safe, legal, and ethical.

172AAB22B8694C05A399B0614C0428AE.description:
Students explore age appropriate technologies and
begin to transfer their learning to
different tools or learning
environments.

509F62E5E4014877960595FF691D5A2E.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an
educator, examine feedback
from both people and the
features embedded in digital
tools, and use age appropriate technology to
share learning.

300A114B849A49C7B11384F6ECC875FF.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
build a network of experts and
peers to customize their
environments to enhance their
learning, in accordance with
school policy.Â

4B1AD7F803A3487493FCE229C5728097.description:
Students, in
collaboration with an educator,
develop learning goals, select
the technology tools to achieve
them, and reflect on and revise
the learning process as needed
to achieve goals.

55E9FE1F8CA3408998351E1381580F4F.description: Empowered Learner - Students leverage technology to take an active role in choosing, achieving, and demonstrating competency in their learning goals, informed by the learning sciences.
